item.title: 蒂森克虏伯因潜艇订单上调自由现金流展望
item.description: 工业集团蒂森克虏伯周四上调了其备受关注的自由现金流展望，理由是与德国军方的一个大型潜艇订单有关的10亿欧元（10.4亿美元）预付款。【原文：Industrial conglomerate Thyssenkrupp on Thursday raised its closely watched outlook for free cash flow, citing 1 billion euros ($1.04 billion) in advance payments relating to a major submarine order by the German military.】

item.title: 路透社采访欧洲央行决策者武契奇
item.description: 以下是路透社对克罗地亚央行行长兼欧洲央行决策者鲍里斯-武伊契奇采访的主要内容。【原文：The following are key quotes from a Reuters interview with Croatian central bank Governor and ECB policymaker Boris Vujcic.】

item.title: 德国商业银行将裁员 3900 人，主要集中在德国
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank）周四表示，作为战略改革的一部分，该行将裁员 3900 人，并公布更宏伟的财务目标，以阻止意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）提出的德国和意大利贷款机构合并的要求。【原文：Commerzbank said on Thursday it would cut 3,900 jobs and unveiled more ambitious financial targets as part of a strategy revamp designed to head off UniCredit's advances for a tie-up between the German and Italian lenders.】

item.title: 德国商业银行抵御联合信贷银行的最新战略要点
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank）周四表示，作为战略改革的一部分，该行将裁员 3900 人，并公布更宏伟的财务目标，以阻止意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）提出的德国和意大利贷款机构合并的要求。【原文：Commerzbank said on Thursday it would cut 3,900 jobs and unveiled more ambitious financial targets as part of a strategy revamp designed to head off UniCredit's advances for a tie-up between the German and Italian lenders.】

item.title: 法国罗格朗公司看到美国对中国商品加征关税的影响达 3,000 万美元
item.description: 法国电气和数字基础设施集团罗格朗（Legrand）首席执行官贝努瓦-科卡特（Benoît Coquart）告诉路透社记者，罗格朗并不认为美国加征关税是一个战略问题，并预计美国对中国进口商品征收10%关税的财政影响约为3000万美元。【原文：French electrical and digital infrastructure group Legrand does not see U.S. tariffs as a strategic issue and expects the financial impact of the 10% U.S. tariff on Chinese imports to be around $30 million, CEO Benoît Coquart told Reuters.】

item.title: 尽管工厂自动化业务疲软，西门子利润仍好于预期
item.description: 西门子周四公布的最新季度利润好于预期，尽管其工厂自动化业务仍在挣扎。【原文：Siemens reported better than expected profit for its latest quarter on Thursday, despite continued struggles at its factory automation business.】

item.title: 雀巢年销售额增长好于预期
item.description: 雀巢公司周四公布的年销售额增长略好于预期，原因是这家全球最大的包装食品公司提高了咖啡、巧克力和宠物食品的价格。【原文：Nestle posted a slightly better-than-expected annual sales growth on Thursday, as the world's biggest packaged food company raised prices for its coffees, chocolates and pet food.】

item.title: 武契奇：即使美联储缓慢降息，欧洲央行也能继续降息
item.description: 克罗地亚政策制定者鲍里斯-武伊契奇（Boris Vujcic）表示，即使美国央行的行动更为缓慢，欧洲央行今年也可能再降息三次，但政策放松的前提是基本通胀率迅速下降。【原文：The European Central Bank could cut interest rates three more times this year even if its U.S. counterpart moves more slowly but policy easing is predicated on a rapid fall in underlying inflation, Croatian policymaker Boris Vujcic said.】

item.title: 凯雷集团收购 Highway-Roop 平台，进军印度汽车零部件行业
item.description: 总部位于美国的投资公司凯雷集团已进入印度汽车零部件市场，购买了印度汽车零部件公司 Highway Industries 和 Roop Automotives 合并成立的实体的控股权。【原文：U.S.-based investment firm Carlyle Group has entered India's auto components market by buying a controlling stake in an entity formed by the combination of Indian auto parts companies Highway Industries and Roop Automotives.】

item.title: 德国面临劳资纠纷年，企业与工人开战
item.description: 德国将在 2025 年面临重大劳资纠纷，因为在残酷的竞争、经济疲软和成本飙升的影响下，企业与工人之间建立起来的纽带--长期以来被视为该国经济成功的支柱--开始瓦解。【原文：Germany faces major labour disputes in 2025, as an established bond between firms and workers -- long seen as a pillar of the country's economic success -- is starting to unravel in the wake of brutal competition, economic weakness and spiralling costs.】

item.title: 中国腾讯在美国地区法院赢得视频版权侵权案
item.description: 美国一家地区法院裁定，台湾电视盒子公司 Unblock Tech 和其他分销商侵犯了中国科技巨头腾讯开发的视频内容的版权，因此判决腾讯赔偿腾讯近 8500 万美元。【原文：A U.S. district court has awarded Tencent nearly $85 million in compensation after finding that Taiwan-based TV box firm Unblock Tech and other distributors violated copyrights of video content developed by the Chinese tech giant.】

item.title: 交易所运营商澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX）新上市企业增加，资本增长，股价大涨
item.description: 澳大利亚交易所运营商澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX）周四表示，上半年新上市股票数量和报价资本总额均有所增长，并表示这一势头将持续到下半年，股价因此收盘上涨 5%。【原文：Australian exchange operator ASX said on Thursday it had recorded higher new listings and total quoted capital in the first half and flagged the momentum was continuing into the second half, leading shares to close 5% higher.】

item.title: 早间竞标乌克兰谈判吸收美国通胀冲击
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 据 TBS 报道，日产和本田董事会均投票决定终止合并谈判
item.description: 据 TBS 广播公司报道，日产和本田的董事会周四均投票决定正式结束两家日本汽车制造商的合并谈判。【原文：The boards of Nissan and Honda both voted on Thursday to officially end talks to merge the two Japanese automakers, broadcaster TBS reported.】

item.title: 网络安全公司 SailPoint 首次公开募股融资 13.8 亿美元，重返美国股市
item.description: 本周四，SailPoint 在纽约首次公开募股的定价为市场预期区间 21 美元至 23 美元的上限，为这家身份安全公司和卖方股东筹集了 13.8 亿美元。【原文：SailPoint priced its New York initial public offering at the top-end of its marketed range of $21-$23 on Thursday, raising $1.38 billion for the identity security firm and the selling stockholder.】

item.title: 韩国对摩根大通、野村、瑞银和摩根士丹利违规卖空行为处以罚款
item.description: 韩国金融监督管理局的一位官员周四表示，韩国市场监督管理局已经对摩根大通、野村、瑞银和摩根士丹利违反国内股市卖空规则的行为处以罚款。【原文：South Korea's market watchdog has imposed fines on JPMorgan, Nomura, UBS and Morgan Stanley for violating short-selling rules in the domestic stock market, an official at the Financial Supervisory Service said on Thursday.】

item.title: DeepSeek 让中国芯片制造商在廉价人工智能竞争中占得先机
item.description: DeepSeek 人工智能（AI）模型的崛起被认为为华为等一些中国芯片制造商在国内市场与更强大的美国处理器竞争提供了更好的机会。【原文：The rise of DeepSeek's artificial intelligence (AI) models is seen providing some Chinese chipmakers such as Huawei a better chance to compete in the domestic market against more powerful U.S. processors.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，蓝色起源公司准备大幅裁员
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引知情人士的话报道称，经过多年研发，蓝色起源公司（Blue Origin）正准备大幅裁员以降低成本，并专注于增加火箭发射次数。【原文：Blue Origin is preparing for significant job cuts to reduce costs and focus on increasing rocket launches after years of research and development, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 百度称人工智能模型厄尼四月起可自由使用
item.description: 中国百度周四表示，其人工智能模型 "厄尼 "将从 4 月 1 日起免费使用。【原文：China's Baidu said on Thursday that its artificial intelligence model Ernie would be free from April 1.】

item.title: South32 将美国铝关税视为谈判策略
item.description: 澳大利亚多元化矿业公司 South32 的首席执行官格雷厄姆-科尔（Graham Kerr）周四表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对铝征收关税更可能是其讨价还价策略的一部分，而非其政府的长期政策。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs on aluminium are more likely to be part of a bargaining strategy than a long-term policy of his administration, said CEO Graham Kerr of Australian diversified miner South32 on Thursday.】

item.title: 派拉蒙频道（包括 CBS 和 Nickelodeon）将退出 YouTube TV
item.description: 媒体巨头派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）的频道，包括哥伦比亚广播公司（CBS）和尼克儿童频道（Nickelodeon），将从周四开始无法在 YouTube TV 上播放，因为双方未能达成续约协议。【原文：Media giant Paramount Global's channels, including CBS and Nickelodeon, will be unavailable on YouTube TV starting Thursday after the two companies failed to reach a contract renewal, both parties said.】

item.title: 全球股市因乌克兰和平希望而反弹，债券遭到抛售
item.description: 由于对乌克兰与俄罗斯达成和平协议的前景持乐观态度，美国和欧洲股票期货周四反弹，抵消了国债收益率跳涨的影响，因为通胀高企有可能关闭美国今年任何宽松政策的大门。【原文：U.S. and European stock futures rallied on Thursday on optimism over prospects of a peace deal between Ukraine and Russia, offsetting a jump in Treasury yields as hot inflation threatens to close the door to any policy easing in the U.S. this year.】

item.title: 乌克兰潜在和平协议可能缓解供应中断，石油价格下跌
item.description: 油价周四下跌，原因是人们预期乌克兰与俄罗斯之间可能达成的和平协议将意味着中断供应流动的制裁措施的结束，而美国总统唐纳德-特朗普打算征收对等关税的做法也激起了通胀忧虑。【原文：Oil prices fell on Thursday on expectations a potential peace deal between Ukraine and Russia would mean the end of sanctions that have disrupted supply flows and U.S. President Donald Trump's intention to introduce reciprocal tariffs stoked inflation jitters.】

item.title: Riot Platforms 任命新董事加入董事会，Starboard、DE Shaw 提供意见
item.description: 比特币矿商Riot Platforms周三表示，在投资者Starboard Value和D. E. Shaw的建议下，公司已任命三名新董事进入董事会。【原文：Bitcoin miner Riot Platforms said on Wednesday it has appointed three new directors to its board after inputs from investors Starboard Value and D. E. Shaw.】

item.title: 独家报道摩根大通首席执行官戴蒙揶揄办公室内的工作推诿，要求提高效率
item.description: 据路透社查阅的一份录音显示，摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）在周三举行的一次生动的全体会议上，蔑视一些员工要求软化该行五天重返办公室政策的呼声。【原文：JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon scorned calls from some employees to soften the bank's five-day return-to-office policy in an animated town hall meeting on Wednesday, according to a recording reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: OpenAI 称马斯克的收购要约与他对其提起的诉讼相矛盾
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在周三提交给联邦法院的一封信中写道，马斯克希望收购 OpenAI，使其成为一个营利实体，这与他的诉讼相冲突，他认为 ChatGPT 制造商的资产不应该用于谋取私利。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk's bid to buy OpenAI, which wants to be a for-profit entity, clashes with his lawsuit arguing that assets of the ChatGPT maker should not be for private gain, OpenAI wrote in a letter it submitted to a federal court on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国通胀数据公布后日元走低，乌克兰和谈提振欧元
item.description: 周四，在消费者物价指数高于预期之后，美元兑日元汇率保持在一周高点附近，而华盛顿希望与俄罗斯开始谈判以结束乌克兰战争的消息则支撑了欧元。【原文：The U.S. dollar held near a one-week high against the Japanese yen on Thursday after a hotter-than-expected consumer prices reading, while the euro was shored up by news that Washington aims to begin talks with Russia to end the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 福特汽车首席执行官在提出对关税的担忧后与立法者举行会议
item.description: 福特公司首席执行官吉姆-法利（Jim Farley）在本周提出对墨西哥和加拿大征收 25% 关税将给美国汽车业带来 "巨大冲击 "的担忧后，于周三会见了美国国会议员。【原文：Ford CEO Jim Farley met with lawmakers in the U.S. Congress on Wednesday after raising concerns this week that 25% tariffs on Mexico and Canada would "blow a hole" in the U.S. auto industry.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，收购公司争相收购网络安全公司趋势科技
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝恩资本（Bain Capital）、Advent International 和 EQT AB 等私募股权公司正在竞争收购日本网络安全公司趋势科技（Trend Micro），该公司市值达 1.32 万亿日元（约合 85.4 亿美元）。【原文：Bain Capital, Advent International and EQT AB are among the private equity firms competing to acquire Japanese cybersecurity firm Trend Micro , which has a market value of 1.32 trillion yen ($8.54 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贸易部长表示，澳大利亚在美国的支持下增加铝出口
item.description: 澳大利亚贸易部长唐-法雷尔（Don Farrell）周四表示，经华盛顿批准，澳大利亚增加了对美国的铝供应量，解决了堪培拉要求豁免美国铝和钢关税的一个障碍。【原文：Australia's trade minister Don Farrell said on Thursday the country had increased aluminium supply to the U.S. with Washington's approval, addressing a hurdle to Canberra's request for an exemption from U.S. tariffs on aluminium and steel.】
